name: TAFFIN Marvin
coverLetter:
Hello, I'm Marvin and i looking for trim work with my girlfriend Manon.
We've got a lot of experience in a farm in France for the seasonal period of the grapes for the wine and in Australia farm for the strawberry, I do a lot of picking and I do trimming since 4 every years in south of France for my own weed.
 I just need a place for put my tent and I need food accommodation if it's possible.
We use to have hard work and we can work every days,
Also we like to exchange with new people, im chef and i can make good French food for your family!!
We not far to your location and we can be there less than one day.
We're not far to you location so we can be there less than one day.
Hope to work with you.
All the best.
Marvin & Manon
